00083 static int cuddZddLinearAux ARGS((DdManager *table, int x, int xLow, int xHigh));
00084 static Move * cuddZddLinearUp ARGS((DdManager *table, int y, int xLow, Move *prevMoves));
00085 static Move * cuddZddLinearDown ARGS((DdManager *table, int x, int xHigh, Move *prevMoves));

00125 int
00126 cuddZddLinearSifting(
00127   DdManager * table,
00128   int  lower,
00129   int  upper)
00130 {
00131     int i;
00132     int *var;
00133     int size;
00134     int x;
00135     int result;
00136 #ifdef DD_STATS
00137     int previousSize;
00138 #endif
00139 
00140     size = table->sizeZ;
00141     empty = table->zero;
00142 
00143     /* Find order in which to sift variables. */
00144     var = NULL;
00145     zdd_entry = ALLOC(int, size);
00146     if (zdd_entry == NULL) {
00147         table->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00148         goto cuddZddSiftingOutOfMem;
00149     }
00150     var = ALLOC(int, size);
00151     if (var == NULL) {
00152         table->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00153         goto cuddZddSiftingOutOfMem;
00154     }
00155 
00156     for (i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00157         x = table->permZ[i];
00158         zdd_entry[i] = table->subtableZ[x].keys;
00159         var[i] = i;
00160     }
00161 
00162     qsort((void *)var, size, sizeof(int), (int (*)(const void *, const void *))cuddZddUniqueCompare);
00163 
00164     /* Now sift. */
00165     for (i = 0; i < ddMin(table->siftMaxVar, size); i++) {
00166         if (zddTotalNumberSwapping >= table->siftMaxSwap)
00167             break;
00168         x = table->permZ[var[i]];
00169         if (x < lower || x > upper) continue;
00170 #ifdef DD_STATS
00171         previousSize = table->keysZ;
00172 #endif
00173         result = cuddZddLinearAux(table, x, lower, upper);
00174         if (!result)
00175             goto cuddZddSiftingOutOfMem;
00176 #ifdef DD_STATS
00177         if (table->keysZ < (unsigned) previousSize) {
00178             (void) fprintf(stdout,"-");
00179         } else if (table->keysZ > (unsigned) previousSize) {
00180             (void) fprintf(stdout,"+"); /* should never happen */
00181             (void) fprintf(stdout,"\nSize increased from %d to %d while sifting variable %d\n", previousSize, table->keysZ , var[i]);
00182         } else {
00183             (void) fprintf(stdout,"=");
00184         }
00185         fflush(stdout);
00186 #endif
00187     }
00188 
00189     FREE(var);
00190     FREE(zdd_entry);
00191 
00192     return(1);
00193 
00194 cuddZddSiftingOutOfMem:
00195 
00196     if (zdd_entry != NULL) FREE(zdd_entry);
00197     if (var != NULL) FREE(var);
00198 
00199     return(0);
00200 
00201 } /* end of cuddZddLinearSifting */

00208 
00224 int
00225 cuddZddLinearInPlace(
00226   DdManager * table,
00227   int  x,
00228   int  y)
00229 {
00230 #ifdef __osf__
00231 #pragma pointer_size save
00232 #pragma pointer_size short
00233 #endif
00234     DdNode **xlist, **ylist;
00235 #ifdef __osf__
00236 #pragma pointer_size restore
00237 #endif
00238     int         xindex, yindex;
00239     int         xslots, yslots;
00240     int         xshift, yshift;
00241     int         oldxkeys, oldykeys;
00242     int         newxkeys, newykeys;
00243     int         i;
00244     int         posn;
00245     DdNode      *f, *f1, *f0, *f11, *f10, *f01, *f00;
00246     DdNode      *newf1, *newf0, *g, *next, *previous;
00247     DdNode      *special;
00248 
00249 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00250     assert(x < y);
00251     assert(cuddZddNextHigh(table,x) == y);
00252     assert(table->subtableZ[x].keys != 0);
00253     assert(table->subtableZ[y].keys != 0);
00254     assert(table->subtableZ[x].dead == 0);
00255     assert(table->subtableZ[y].dead == 0);
00256 #endif
00257 
00258     zddTotalNumberLinearTr++;
00259 
00260     /* Get parameters of x subtable. */
00261     xindex   = table->invpermZ[x];
00262     xlist    = table->subtableZ[x].nodelist;
00263     oldxkeys = table->subtableZ[x].keys;
00264     xslots   = table->subtableZ[x].slots;
00265     xshift   = table->subtableZ[x].shift;
00266     newxkeys = 0;
00267 
00268     /* Get parameters of y subtable. */
00269     yindex   = table->invpermZ[y];
00270     ylist    = table->subtableZ[y].nodelist;
00271     oldykeys = table->subtableZ[y].keys;
00272     yslots   = table->subtableZ[y].slots;
00273     yshift   = table->subtableZ[y].shift;
00274     newykeys = oldykeys;
00275 
00276     /* The nodes in the x layer are put in two chains.  The chain
00277     ** pointed by g holds the normal nodes. When re-expressed they stay
00278     ** in the x list. The chain pointed by special holds the elements
00279     ** that will move to the y list.
00280     */
00281     g = special = NULL;
00282     for (i = 0; i < xslots; i++) {
00283         f = xlist[i];
00284         if (f == NULL) continue;
00285         xlist[i] = NULL;
00286         while (f != NULL) {
00287             next = f->next;
00288             f1 = cuddT(f);
00289             /* if (f1->index == yindex) */ cuddSatDec(f1->ref);
00290             f0 = cuddE(f);
00291             /* if (f0->index == yindex) */ cuddSatDec(f0->ref);
00292             if ((int) f1->index == yindex && cuddE(f1) == empty &&
00293                 (int) f0->index != yindex) {
00294                 f->next = special;
00295                 special = f;
00296             } else {
00297                 f->next = g;
00298                 g = f;
00299             }
00300             f = next;
00301         } /* while there are elements in the collision chain */
00302     } /* for each slot of the x subtable */
00303 
00304     /* Mark y nodes with pointers from above x. We mark them by
00305     **  changing their index to x.
00306     */
00307     for (i = 0; i < yslots; i++) {
00308         f = ylist[i];
00309         while (f != NULL) {
00310             if (f->ref != 0) {
00311                 f->index = xindex;
00312             }
00313             f = f->next;
00314         } /* while there are elements in the collision chain */
00315     } /* for each slot of the y subtable */
00316 
00317     /* Move special nodes to the y list. */
00318     f = special;
00319     while (f != NULL) {
00320         next = f->next;
00321         f1 = cuddT(f);
00322         f11 = cuddT(f1);
00323         cuddT(f) = f11;
00324         cuddSatInc(f11->ref);
00325         f0 = cuddE(f);
00326         cuddSatInc(f0->ref);
00327         f->index = yindex;
00328         /* Insert at the beginning of the list so that it will be
00329         ** found first if there is a duplicate. The duplicate will
00330         ** eventually be moved or garbage collected. No node
00331         ** re-expression will add a pointer to it.
00332         */
00333         posn = ddHash(f11, f0, yshift);
00334         f->next = ylist[posn];
00335         ylist[posn] = f;
00336         newykeys++;
00337         f = next;
00338     }
00339 
00340     /* Take care of the remaining x nodes that must be re-expressed.
00341     ** They form a linked list pointed by g.
00342     */
00343     f = g;
00344     while (f != NULL) {
00345         next = f->next;
00346         /* Find f1, f0, f11, f10, f01, f00. */
00347         f1 = cuddT(f);
00348         if ((int) f1->index == yindex || (int) f1->index == xindex) {
00349             f11 = cuddT(f1); f10 = cuddE(f1);
00350         } else {
00351             f11 = empty; f10 = f1;
00352         }
00353         f0 = cuddE(f);
00354         if ((int) f0->index == yindex || (int) f0->index == xindex) {
00355             f01 = cuddT(f0); f00 = cuddE(f0);
00356         } else {
00357             f01 = empty; f00 = f0;
00358         }
00359         /* Create the new T child. */
00360         if (f01 == empty) {
00361             newf1 = f10;
00362             cuddSatInc(newf1->ref);
00363         } else {
00364             /* Check ylist for triple (yindex, f01, f10). */
00365             posn = ddHash(f01, f10, yshift);
00366             /* For each element newf1 in collision list ylist[posn]. */
00367             newf1 = ylist[posn];
00368             /* Search the collision chain skipping the marked nodes. */
00369             while (newf1 != NULL) {
00370                 if (cuddT(newf1) == f01 && cuddE(newf1) == f10 &&
00371                     (int) newf1->index == yindex) {
00372                     cuddSatInc(newf1->ref);
00373                     break; /* match */
00374                 }
00375                 newf1 = newf1->next;
00376             } /* while newf1 */
00377             if (newf1 == NULL) {        /* no match */
00378                 newf1 = cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
00379                 if (newf1 == NULL)
00380                     goto zddSwapOutOfMem;
00381                 newf1->index = yindex; newf1->ref = 1;
00382                 cuddT(newf1) = f01;
00383                 cuddE(newf1) = f10;
00384                 /* Insert newf1 in the collision list ylist[pos];
00385                 ** increase the ref counts of f01 and f10
00386                 */
00387                 newykeys++;
00388                 newf1->next = ylist[posn];
00389                 ylist[posn] = newf1;
00390                 cuddSatInc(f01->ref);
00391                 cuddSatInc(f10->ref);
00392             }
00393         }
00394         cuddT(f) = newf1;
00395 
00396         /* Do the same for f0. */
00397         /* Create the new E child. */
00398         if (f11 == empty) {
00399             newf0 = f00;
00400             cuddSatInc(newf0->ref);
00401         } else {
00402             /* Check ylist for triple (yindex, f11, f00). */
00403             posn = ddHash(f11, f00, yshift);
00404             /* For each element newf0 in collision list ylist[posn]. */
00405             newf0 = ylist[posn];
00406             while (newf0 != NULL) {
00407                 if (cuddT(newf0) == f11 && cuddE(newf0) == f00 &&
00408                     (int) newf0->index == yindex) {
00409                     cuddSatInc(newf0->ref);
00410                     break; /* match */
00411                 }
00412                 newf0 = newf0->next;
00413             } /* while newf0 */
00414             if (newf0 == NULL) {        /* no match */
00415                 newf0 = cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
00416                 if (newf0 == NULL)
00417                     goto zddSwapOutOfMem;
00418                 newf0->index = yindex; newf0->ref = 1;
00419                 cuddT(newf0) = f11; cuddE(newf0) = f00;
00420                 /* Insert newf0 in the collision list ylist[posn];
00421                 ** increase the ref counts of f11 and f00.
00422                 */
00423                 newykeys++;
00424                 newf0->next = ylist[posn];
00425                 ylist[posn] = newf0;
00426                 cuddSatInc(f11->ref);
00427                 cuddSatInc(f00->ref);
00428             }
00429         }
00430         cuddE(f) = newf0;
00431 
00432         /* Re-insert the modified f in xlist.
00433         ** The modified f does not already exists in xlist.
00434         ** (Because of the uniqueness of the cofactors.)
00435         */
00436         posn = ddHash(newf1, newf0, xshift);
00437         newxkeys++;
00438         f->next = xlist[posn];
00439         xlist[posn] = f;
00440         f = next;
00441     } /* while f != NULL */
00442 
00443     /* GC the y layer and move the marked nodes to the x list. */
00444 
00445     /* For each node f in ylist. */
00446     for (i = 0; i < yslots; i++) {
00447         previous = NULL;
00448         f = ylist[i];
00449         while (f != NULL) {
00450             next = f->next;
00451             if (f->ref == 0) {
00452                 cuddSatDec(cuddT(f)->ref);
00453                 cuddSatDec(cuddE(f)->ref);
00454                 cuddDeallocNode(table, f);
00455                 newykeys--;
00456                 if (previous == NULL)
00457                     ylist[i] = next;
00458                 else
00459                     previous->next = next;
00460             } else if ((int) f->index == xindex) { /* move marked node */
00461                 if (previous == NULL)
00462                     ylist[i] = next;
00463                 else
00464                     previous->next = next;
00465                 f1 = cuddT(f);
00466                 cuddSatDec(f1->ref);
00467                 /* Check ylist for triple (yindex, f1, empty). */
00468                 posn = ddHash(f1, empty, yshift);
00469                 /* For each element newf1 in collision list ylist[posn]. */
00470                 newf1 = ylist[posn];
00471                 while (newf1 != NULL) {
00472                     if (cuddT(newf1) == f1 && cuddE(newf1) == empty &&
00473                         (int) newf1->index == yindex) {
00474                         cuddSatInc(newf1->ref);
00475                         break; /* match */
00476                     }
00477                     newf1 = newf1->next;
00478                 } /* while newf1 */
00479                 if (newf1 == NULL) {    /* no match */
00480                     newf1 = cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
00481                     if (newf1 == NULL)
00482                         goto zddSwapOutOfMem;
00483                     newf1->index = yindex; newf1->ref = 1;
00484                     cuddT(newf1) = f1; cuddE(newf1) = empty;
00485                     /* Insert newf1 in the collision list ylist[posn];
00486                     ** increase the ref counts of f1 and empty.
00487                     */
00488                     newykeys++;
00489                     newf1->next = ylist[posn];
00490                     ylist[posn] = newf1;
00491                     if (posn == i && previous == NULL)
00492                         previous = newf1;
00493                     cuddSatInc(f1->ref);
00494                     cuddSatInc(empty->ref);
00495                 }
00496                 cuddT(f) = newf1;
00497                 f0 = cuddE(f);
00498                 /* Insert f in x list. */
00499                 posn = ddHash(newf1, f0, xshift);
00500                 newxkeys++;
00501                 newykeys--;
00502                 f->next = xlist[posn];
00503                 xlist[posn] = f;
00504             } else {
00505                 previous = f;
00506             }
00507             f = next;
00508         } /* while f */
00509     } /* for i */
00510 
00511     /* Set the appropriate fields in table. */
00512     table->subtableZ[x].keys     = newxkeys;
00513     table->subtableZ[y].keys     = newykeys;
00514 
00515     table->keysZ += newxkeys + newykeys - oldxkeys - oldykeys;
00516 
00517     /* Update univ section; univ[x] remains the same. */
00518     table->univ[y] = cuddT(table->univ[x]);
00519 
00520 #if 0
00521     (void) fprintf(stdout,"x = %d  y = %d\n", x, y);
00522     (void) Cudd_DebugCheck(table);
00523     (void) Cudd_CheckKeys(table);
00524 #endif
00525 
00526     return (table->keysZ);
00527 
00528 zddSwapOutOfMem:
00529     (void) fprintf(stderr, "Error: cuddZddSwapInPlace() out of memory\n");
00530 
00531     return (0);
00532 
00533 } /* end of cuddZddLinearInPlace */
00534 
00535 
00550 static int
00551 cuddZddLinearAux(
00552   DdManager * table,
00553   int  x,
00554   int  xLow,
00555   int  xHigh)
00556 {
00557     Move        *move;
00558     Move        *moveUp;        /* list of up move */
00559     Move        *moveDown;      /* list of down move */
00560 
00561     int         initial_size;
00562     int         result;
00563 
00564     initial_size = table->keysZ;
00565 
00566 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00567     assert(table->subtableZ[x].keys > 0);
00568 #endif
00569 
00570     moveDown = NULL;
00571     moveUp = NULL;
00572 
00573     if (x == xLow) {
00574         moveDown = cuddZddLinearDown(table, x, xHigh, NULL);
00575         /* At this point x --> xHigh. */
00576         if (moveDown == (Move *) CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM)
00577             goto cuddZddLinearAuxOutOfMem;
00578         /* Move backward and stop at best position. */
00579         result = cuddZddLinearBackward(table, initial_size, moveDown);
00580         if (!result)
00581             goto cuddZddLinearAuxOutOfMem;
00582 
00583     } else if (x == xHigh) {
00584         moveUp = cuddZddLinearUp(table, x, xLow, NULL);
00585         /* At this point x --> xLow. */
00586         if (moveUp == (Move *) CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM)
00587             goto cuddZddLinearAuxOutOfMem;
00588         /* Move backward and stop at best position. */
00589         result = cuddZddLinearBackward(table, initial_size, moveUp);
00590         if (!result)
00591             goto cuddZddLinearAuxOutOfMem;
00592 
00593     } else if ((x - xLow) > (xHigh - x)) { /* must go down first: shorter */
00594         moveDown = cuddZddLinearDown(table, x, xHigh, NULL);
00595         /* At this point x --> xHigh. */
00596         if (moveDown == (Move *) CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM)
00597             goto cuddZddLinearAuxOutOfMem;
00598         moveUp = cuddZddUndoMoves(table,moveDown);
00599 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00600         assert(moveUp == NULL || moveUp->x == x);
00601 #endif
00602         moveUp = cuddZddLinearUp(table, x, xLow, moveUp);
00603         if (moveUp == (Move *) CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM)
00604             goto cuddZddLinearAuxOutOfMem;
00605         /* Move backward and stop at best position. */
00606         result = cuddZddLinearBackward(table, initial_size, moveUp);
00607         if (!result)
00608             goto cuddZddLinearAuxOutOfMem;
00609 
00610     } else {
00611         moveUp = cuddZddLinearUp(table, x, xLow, NULL);
00612         /* At this point x --> xHigh. */
00613         if (moveUp == (Move *) CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM)
00614             goto cuddZddLinearAuxOutOfMem;
00615         /* Then move up. */
00616         moveDown = cuddZddUndoMoves(table,moveUp);
00617 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00618         assert(moveDown == NULL || moveDown->y == x);
00619 #endif
00620         moveDown = cuddZddLinearDown(table, x, xHigh, moveDown);
00621         if (moveDown == (Move *) CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM)
00622             goto cuddZddLinearAuxOutOfMem;
00623         /* Move backward and stop at best position. */
00624         result = cuddZddLinearBackward(table, initial_size, moveDown);
00625         if (!result)
00626             goto cuddZddLinearAuxOutOfMem;
00627     }
00628 
00629     while (moveDown != NULL) {
00630         move = moveDown->next;
00631         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *)moveDown);
00632         moveDown = move;
00633     }
00634     while (moveUp != NULL) {
00635         move = moveUp->next;
00636         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *)moveUp);
00637         moveUp = move;
00638     }
00639 
00640     return(1);
00641 
00642 cuddZddLinearAuxOutOfMem:
00643     if (moveDown != (Move *) CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM) {
00644         while (moveDown != NULL) {
00645             move = moveDown->next;
00646             cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *)moveDown);
00647             moveDown = move;
00648         }
00649     }
00650     if (moveUp != (Move *) CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM) {
00651         while (moveUp != NULL) {
00652             move = moveUp->next;
00653             cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *)moveUp);
00654             moveUp = move;
00655         }
00656     }
00657 
00658     return(0);
00659 
00660 } /* end of cuddZddLinearAux */
00661 
00662 
00677 static Move *
00678 cuddZddLinearUp(
00679   DdManager * table,
00680   int  y,
00681   int  xLow,
00682   Move * prevMoves)
00683 {
00684     Move        *moves;
00685     Move        *move;
00686     int         x;
00687     int         size, newsize;
00688     int         limitSize;
00689 
00690     moves = prevMoves;
00691     limitSize = table->keysZ;
00692 
00693     x = cuddZddNextLow(table, y);
00694     while (x >= xLow) {
00695         size = cuddZddSwapInPlace(table, x, y);
00696         if (size == 0)
00697             goto cuddZddLinearUpOutOfMem;
00698         newsize = cuddZddLinearInPlace(table, x, y);
00699         if (newsize == 0)
00700             goto cuddZddLinearUpOutOfMem;
00701         move = (Move *) cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
00702         if (move == NULL)
00703             goto cuddZddLinearUpOutOfMem;
00704         move->x = x;
00705         move->y = y;
00706         move->next = moves;
00707         moves = move;
00708         move->flags = CUDD_SWAP_MOVE;
00709         if (newsize > size) {
00710             /* Undo transformation. The transformation we apply is
00711             ** its own inverse. Hence, we just apply the transformation
00712             ** again.
00713             */
00714             newsize = cuddZddLinearInPlace(table,x,y);
00715             if (newsize == 0) goto cuddZddLinearUpOutOfMem;
00716 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00717             if (newsize != size) {
00718                 (void) fprintf(stdout,"Change in size after identity transformation! From %d to %d\n",size,newsize);
00719             }
00720 #endif
00721         } else {
00722             size = newsize;
00723             move->flags = CUDD_LINEAR_TRANSFORM_MOVE;
00724         }
00725         move->size = size;
00726 
00727         if ((double)size > (double)limitSize * table->maxGrowth)
00728             break;
00729         if (size < limitSize)
00730             limitSize = size;
00731 
00732         y = x;
00733         x = cuddZddNextLow(table, y);
00734     }
00735     return(moves);
00736 
00737 cuddZddLinearUpOutOfMem:
00738     while (moves != NULL) {
00739         move = moves->next;
00740         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *)moves);
00741         moves = move;
00742     }
00743     return((Move *) CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM);
00744 
00745 } /* end of cuddZddLinearUp */
00746 
00747 
00762 static Move *
00763 cuddZddLinearDown(
00764   DdManager * table,
00765   int  x,
00766   int  xHigh,
00767   Move * prevMoves)
00768 {
00769     Move        *moves;
00770     Move        *move;
00771     int         y;
00772     int         size, newsize;
00773     int         limitSize;
00774 
00775     moves = prevMoves;
00776     limitSize = table->keysZ;
00777 
00778     y = cuddZddNextHigh(table, x);
00779     while (y <= xHigh) {
00780         size = cuddZddSwapInPlace(table, x, y);
00781         if (size == 0)
00782             goto cuddZddLinearDownOutOfMem;
00783         newsize = cuddZddLinearInPlace(table, x, y);
00784         if (newsize == 0)
00785             goto cuddZddLinearDownOutOfMem;
00786         move = (Move *) cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
00787         if (move == NULL)
00788             goto cuddZddLinearDownOutOfMem;
00789         move->x = x;
00790         move->y = y;
00791         move->next = moves;
00792         moves = move;
00793         move->flags = CUDD_SWAP_MOVE;
00794         if (newsize > size) {
00795             /* Undo transformation. The transformation we apply is
00796             ** its own inverse. Hence, we just apply the transformation
00797             ** again.
00798             */
00799             newsize = cuddZddLinearInPlace(table,x,y);
00800             if (newsize == 0) goto cuddZddLinearDownOutOfMem;
00801             if (newsize != size) {
00802                 (void) fprintf(stdout,"Change in size after identity transformation! From %d to %d\n",size,newsize);
00803             }
00804         } else {
00805             size = newsize;
00806             move->flags = CUDD_LINEAR_TRANSFORM_MOVE;
00807         }
00808         move->size = size;
00809 
00810         if ((double)size > (double)limitSize * table->maxGrowth)
00811             break;
00812         if (size < limitSize)
00813             limitSize = size;
00814 
00815         x = y;
00816         y = cuddZddNextHigh(table, x);
00817     }
00818     return(moves);
00819 
00820 cuddZddLinearDownOutOfMem:
00821     while (moves != NULL) {
00822         move = moves->next;
00823         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *)moves);
00824         moves = move;
00825     }
00826     return((Move *) CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM);
00827 
00828 } /* end of cuddZddLinearDown */
00829 
00830 
00846 static int
00847 cuddZddLinearBackward(
00848   DdManager * table,
00849   int  size,
00850   Move * moves)
00851 {
00852     Move        *move;
00853     int         res;
00854 
00855     /* Find the minimum size among moves. */
00856     for (move = moves; move != NULL; move = move->next) {
00857         if (move->size < size) {
00858             size = move->size;
00859         }
00860     }
00861 
00862     for (move = moves; move != NULL; move = move->next) {
00863         if (move->size == size) return(1);
00864         if (move->flags == CUDD_LINEAR_TRANSFORM_MOVE) {
00865             res = cuddZddLinearInPlace(table,(int)move->x,(int)move->y);
00866             if (!res) return(0);
00867         }
00868         res = cuddZddSwapInPlace(table, move->x, move->y);
00869         if (!res)
00870             return(0);
00871         if (move->flags == CUDD_INVERSE_TRANSFORM_MOVE) {
00872             res = cuddZddLinearInPlace(table,(int)move->x,(int)move->y);
00873             if (!res) return(0);
00874         }
00875     }
00876 
00877     return(1);
00878 
00879 } /* end of cuddZddLinearBackward */
00880 
00881 
00894 static Move*
00895 cuddZddUndoMoves(
00896   DdManager * table,
00897   Move * moves)
00898 {
00899     Move *invmoves = NULL;
00900     Move *move;
00901     Move *invmove;
00902     int size;
00903 
00904     for (move = moves; move != NULL; move = move->next) {
00905         invmove = (Move *) cuddDynamicAllocNode(table);
00906         if (invmove == NULL) goto cuddZddUndoMovesOutOfMem;
00907         invmove->x = move->x;
00908         invmove->y = move->y;
00909         invmove->next = invmoves;
00910         invmoves = invmove;
00911         if (move->flags == CUDD_SWAP_MOVE) {
00912             invmove->flags = CUDD_SWAP_MOVE;
00913             size = cuddZddSwapInPlace(table,(int)move->x,(int)move->y);
00914             if (!size) goto cuddZddUndoMovesOutOfMem;
00915         } else if (move->flags == CUDD_LINEAR_TRANSFORM_MOVE) {
00916             invmove->flags = CUDD_INVERSE_TRANSFORM_MOVE;
00917             size = cuddZddLinearInPlace(table,(int)move->x,(int)move->y);
00918             if (!size) goto cuddZddUndoMovesOutOfMem;
00919             size = cuddZddSwapInPlace(table,(int)move->x,(int)move->y);
00920             if (!size) goto cuddZddUndoMovesOutOfMem;
00921         } else { /* must be CUDD_INVERSE_TRANSFORM_MOVE */
00922 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00923             (void) fprintf(stdout,"Unforseen event in ddUndoMoves!\n");
00924 #endif
00925             invmove->flags = CUDD_LINEAR_TRANSFORM_MOVE;
00926             size = cuddZddSwapInPlace(table,(int)move->x,(int)move->y);
00927             if (!size) goto cuddZddUndoMovesOutOfMem;
00928             size = cuddZddLinearInPlace(table,(int)move->x,(int)move->y);
00929             if (!size) goto cuddZddUndoMovesOutOfMem;
00930         }
00931         invmove->size = size;
00932     }
00933 
00934     return(invmoves);
00935 
00936 cuddZddUndoMovesOutOfMem:
00937     while (invmoves != NULL) {
00938         move = invmoves->next;
00939         cuddDeallocNode(table, (DdNode *) invmoves);
00940         invmoves = move;
00941     }
00942     return((Move *) CUDD_OUT_OF_MEM);
00943 
00944 } /* end of cuddZddUndoMoves */
00945
